Description: An EC2 instance with Apache installation, user creation, KMS, EBS, private IP, and subnet using an existing security group

InstanceType.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid EC2 instance type.

SecurityGroupId.Description: ID of an existing Security Group
SecurityGroupId.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid security group ID.

SubnetId.Description: The subnet ID where the instance will be deployed

PrivateIpAddress.Description: The IP address range that can be used to SSH to the EC2 instances

KeyName.Description: Name of an existing EC2 KeyPair to enable SSH access to the instance
KeyName.ConstraintDescription: must be the name of an existing EC2 KeyPair.

EbsVolumeSize.Description: The size of the EBS volume in GB
